errors.invalidTimeRange: Clock out time must be after clock in time

success.submitted: Correction request submitted for manager approval

correction.timezoneNote: Times are in your local timezone ({timezone})

manualEntry.title: Add Manual Time Entry

errors.invalidTimeRange: Clock out time must be after clock in time
errors.futureDate: Cannot create entries for future dates
errors.overlapping: This entry overlaps with an existing work period

errors.holidayBlockedDesc: This day is marked as a holiday and time entries are not allowed
